file.description: Common implementations of collection classes.

file.title: Jakarta Regexp
file.description: Regexp is a Java Regular Expression package that was graciously donated to the Apache Software Foundation by Jonathan Locke.

file.title: Avalon Logkit
file.description: avalon-logkit is a logging toolkit designed for secure performance oriented logging in applications.

file.title: The XSLT processor
file.description: Xalan is an XSLT processor that fully supports the W3C specs. Includes XSLTC.

file.title: The XML parser
file.description: Xerces is an XML parser.

file.title: The XML APIs
file.description: JAXP, DOM and SAX interfaces. These are the common interfaces for XML processing.

file.title: Batik
file.description: Batik is a Java based toolkit for applications which handle images in the Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) format for various purposes, such as viewing, generation or manipulation.

file.title: BSF scripting framework
file.description: The Bean Scripting Framework (BSF) is an architecture for incorporating scripting into, and enabling scripting against, Java applications and applets. Using BSF, an application can use scripting, and become scriptable, against any BSF-supported language. When BSF supports additional languages, the application will automatically support the additional languages.

file.title: Device capabilities
file.description: Open Source Delivery Context Java Library supporting CC/PP and UAProf. Different web-enabled devices have different input, output, hardware, software, network and browser capabilities. In order for a web server or web-based application to provide optimized content to different clients it requires a description of the capabilities of the client known as the delivery context.

file.title: Jakarta Commons HttpClient
file.description: Although the java.net package provides basic support for accessing resources via HTTP, it doesn't provide the full flexibility or functionality needed by many applications. The Jakarta Commons HttpClient component seeks to fill this void by providing an efficient, up-to-date, and feature-rich package implementing the client side of the most recent HTTP standards and recommendations.

file.title: Jakarta Commons Logging
file.description: The Logging package is an ultra-thin bridge between different logging libraries.

file.title: iText XML to PDF/HTML/RTF converter (Renderer)
file.description: iText reads XML documents and turns them into PDFs

file.title: iText XML to PDF/HTML/RTF converter (XML APIs)
file.description: iText reads XML documents and turns them into PDFs

file.title: XML FO processor
file.description: FOP is a Java application that reads a formatting object tree conforming to the XSL recommendation and then turns it into a PDF document.

file.title: XSL-FO to RTF converter
file.description: jfor is a Java application that reads XSL-FO documents and converts them to RTF format, allowing them to be loaded in common wordprocessors.

file.title: Simple SQL database
file.description: hsqldb is a relational database engine written in Java, with a JDBC driver, supporting a subset of ANSI-92 SQL. It offers a small, fast database engine which offers both in memory and disk based tables.

file.title: Create proprietary file formats
file.description: The POI project consists of APIs for manipulating various file formats based upon Microsoft's OLE 2 Compound Document format using pure Java.

file.title: Jena RDF framework
file.description: Jena is a java API for manipulating RDF models.

file.title: ICU4J International Components for Unicode framework
file.description: The International Components for Unicode (ICU) library provides robust and full-featured Unicode services on a wide variety of platforms.

file.title: JISP
file.description: Java Indexed Serialization Package

file.title: JCS
file.description: Java Caching System

file.title: EHCache
file.description: Easy Hibernate Cache

file.title: Java Formatter
file.description: This program formats Java code with consistent indentation and so forth, to make it easier to read and maintain.

file.title: Transform HTML to XML
file.description: Tidy is a HTML syntax checker and pretty printer.

file.title: Search engine
file.description: jakarta-lucene is a search engine toolkit designed for indexing and searching of documents.

file.title: Pizza Java Compiler
file.description: Java Compiler

file.title: Log4j
file.description: Logging for java

file.title: XML Catalog Entity Resolver
file.description: Maps URIs to other URIs using the mechanisms defined by OASIS Catalog or XML Catalog. Mainly used for DTDs and character entity sets, but can be used for other resources too.

file.description: Servlet API Version 2.2

file.description: Database tailored for the storage of XML data.

file.description: JSTL Expression Language

file.title: Continuations-based JavaScript engine
file.description: Rhino is an implementation of JavaScript in Java.

file.description: Embedded Java Compiler API

file.title: JavacAPI Eclipse Implementation
file.description: Embedded Java Compiler API implemented with Eclipse JDT Core

file.title: Spark
file.description: Spark is a Java library that converts data in Macromedias SWF ("Flash") data format to XML conforming to a specialized DTD and vice versa

file.title: Chaperon Text Parser
file.description: The chaperon project is parser which could parse text files, and convert those to XML files.

file.title: Slide kernel
file.description: The Jakarta Slide kernel API.

file.title: Slide stores
file.description: The Jakarta Slide stores implementation.

file.title: Slide WebDAV Servlet
file.description: The Jakarta Slide WebDAV servlet.

file.description: The Jakarta Slide WebDAV client library.

file.title: JDOM
file.description: JDOM

file.title: JTA spec
file.description: J2EE Java Transaction API. Implementation taken from the Apache Geronimo project for license compatibility.

file.title: WSDL
file.description: The Web Services Description Language for Java Toolkit (WSDL4J) allows the creation, representation, and manipulation of WSDL documents describing services

file.title: SOAP with Attachments API for Java (SAAJ)
file.description: SAAJ enables developers to produce and consume messages conforming to the SOAP 1.1 specification and SOAP with Attachments note.

file.title: Commons Discovery
file.description: The Discovery Component is about discovering, or finding, implementations for pluggable interfaces. It provides facilities intantiating classes in general, and for lifecycle management of singleton (factory) classes.

file.title: Java API for XML-based RPC (JAX-RPC)
file.description: The JAX-RPC enables Java technology developers to build Web applications and Web services incorporating XML based RPC functionality according to the SOAP (Simple Object Access Protocol) 1.1 specification. JAX-RPC provides the core API for developing and deploying web services on the Java platform.

file.title: Apache Axis
file.description: Apache Axis is an implementation of the SOAP ("Simple Object Access Protocol")

file.title: Jakarta Commons lang
file.description: Part of jakarta-commons, it's a package that provides extended services on base classes of the JDK, such as unrolling exceptions.

file.title: xReporter expression language interpreter
file.description: An expression language interpreter.

file.title: ORO
file.description: Perl5 compatible regular expression engine

file.title: Joost
file.description: Streaming Transformation for XML (STX) library

file.title: QDox - Quick JavaDoc Scanner
file.description: QDox is a high speed, small footprint parser for extracting class/interface/method definitions from source files complete with JavaDoc @tags.

file.title: Quartz
file.description: Quartz Scheduler

file.title: Garbage
file.description: Garbage

file.title: Jakarta Commons Betwixt
file.description: The Betwixt library provides an XML introspection mechanism for mapping beans to XML in a flexible way. It is implemented using an XMLIntrospector and XMLBeanInfo classes which are similar to the standard Introspector and BeanInfo from the Java Beans specification.

file.title: Jakarta Commons Beantuils
file.description: The Java language provides Reflection and Introspection APIs (see the java.lang.reflect and java.beans packages in the JDK Javadocs). However, these APIs can be quite complex to understand and utilize. The BeanUtils component provides easy-to-use wrappers around these capabilities.

file.title: Jakarta Commons Digester
file.description: Allow configure an XML -> Java object mapping module, which triggers certain actions called rules whenever a particular pattern of nested XML elements is recognized. A rich set of predefined rules is available for your use, or you can also create your own.

file.title: Antlr - ANother Tool for Language Recognition
file.description: language tool that provides a framework for constructing recognizers, compilers, and translators from grammatical descriptions containing Java, C#, or C++ actions

file.title: Jakarta Commons DBCP
file.description: Database Connection Pool API

file.title: Jakarta Commons Pool
file.description: defines a handful of pooling interfaces and some base classes that may be useful when creating new pool implementations.

file.title: Apache ObJectRelationalBridge
file.description: OJB is an Object/Relational mapping tool that allows transparent persistence for Java Objects against relational databases.

file.title: JMS Spec
file.description: J2EE Java Message Service Specification. This implentation developed by the (currently incubating) Apache Geronimo project is an open source implementation from the original spec. As such it is licensed under the Apache license and therefore freely distributable.

file.title: JSR-168 Portlet Spec
file.description: JSR-168 Portlet Specification. This implentation developed by the Jakarta Pluto project is an open source implementation from the original spec.

file.title: JSR-168 Container Implementation
file.description: JSR-168 Portlet Specification. This implentation developed by the Jakarta Pluto project is an open source implementation from the original spec.
